data.eml:eml: A new species of Masarina Richards 1962 from southern Africa, description of the female of Masarina ceres Gess 1997 and supplementary data on three other species of the genus (Hymenoptera, Vespidae, Masarinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gess, Friedrich Wolfgang (2012): A new species of Masarina Richards 1962 from southern Africa, description of the female of Masarina ceres Gess 1997 and supplementary data on three other species of the genus (Hymenoptera, Vespidae, Masarinae). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 25: 83-92, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.25.2442, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.25.2442
